rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Lead isNew and all filled in

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.label: Lead Mobile Phone changed and not Consent

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.label: Lead Mobile Phone changed and Consent changed

value.stringValue: OR(ISCHANGED([Lead].Consent_to_Text__c), ISNEW() && [Lead].Consent_to_Text__c) && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Lead Loader' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Marketo'

formulas.name: formula_myRule_15
formulas.expression: OR(ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Consent_to_Text__c}), ISNEW() && {!myVariable_current.Consent_to_Text__c}) && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Lead Loader' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Marketo'

value.stringValue: ISCHANGED( [Lead].MobilePhone ) && NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE([Lead].MobilePhone))) && NOT(ISCHANGED([Lead].Consent_to_Text__c)) && [Lead].Consent_to_Text__c && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Lead Loader' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Marketo'

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.MobilePhone} ) && NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.MobilePhone}))) && NOT(ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Consent_to_Text__c})) && {!myVariable_current.Consent_to_Text__c} && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Lead Loader' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Marketo'

value.stringValue: ISCHANGED( [Lead].MobilePhone ) && NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE([Lead].MobilePhone))) && [Lead].Consent_to_Text__c && NOT(PRIORVALUE([Lead].Consent_to_Text__c)) && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Lead Loader' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Marketo'

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.MobilePhone} ) && NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.MobilePhone}))) && {!myVariable_current.Consent_to_Text__c} && NOT(PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Consent_to_Text__c})) && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Lead Loader' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator API-Marketo'
